Posts.Content: Hi, I was diag. 5-20-02 with accb tumor size 2.5 i had lump. did 33 rounds of radiat. and 6 rounds of chem. now have been taking tamoxifen for 4 yrs. clear margins I did chemo due to strong family hisory of breast cancer and my mother died of brain cancer at age 33.. just looking for any new info.  will have 5 yrs anniversity 5-20-07 cancer free. Most info i have found is 3-4 yrs old. Thanks
Posts.Title: accb updated info

Posts.Content: Hi Rita, I am a 5 yr surivor of this cancer also.  I am doing great. with no problems. I did chemo radition and take tamoxifen I have 6 more months on the tamoxifen, and down to yearly visits. Best of luck to you. Take Care Karin
Posts.Title: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma in the Breast
